TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 1, pp. 910
TEI.2.document_title: Stephen F. Austin to Seth Ingram, 09-30-1824

barker_notes.barker_summary: Receipt for notes and due bills.
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 1, pp. 910

div1.p: Receipt for notes and due bills.

Recd of Seth Ingram the above orders amounting to one hundred and Eighteen Dollars and fifty cents also an account against Saml Dixon's Estate amounting to four Dollars and fifty cents making one hundred and twenty three Dollars in all which is passed to said Ingram's Credit in our account currant
